Paragraph: On the other hand , the maximum absorption peaks of PCZDTB ( λ max ) were observed at 386 and 514 nm in solution.

In this paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Name" entities:

* λ max (lambda max)

Note that λ max is a Greek letter lambda and "max" is short for "maximum". It represents the maximum absorption peaks of PCZDTB (a material) in solution, and it is a property of the material.
